text: Eridania Planitia is a plain located east of Hellas Planitia, in the southern highlands of Mars. Its name was approved on September 22, 2010; it is named after the closest classical albedo feature. ==References== == See also == * List of plains on Mars * Eridania Lake Category:Plains on Mars Category:Eridania quadrangle
title: Eridania Planitia
